zh.title: 聯絡我們
zh.Description: Codexical 非常期待與您的合作，如果您對於我們的服務有興趣，可以透過email聯絡我們。
zh.EmailDescription: 請詳細的說明您的需求，我們會盡快回覆！
zh.OtherContact: 或者，您也可以從以下方式聯絡到我們

en.title: Contact
en.Description: Codexical look forward to collaborate with you, If you are intrested in our services, You can contact us via email.
en.EmailDescription: Please provide your requirement in detail, we weill reply ASAP!
en.OtherContact: Or, you can also reach us by
